meanings.definition: Consisting of or involving more than one member.
meanings.sent1: The multimember team worked together to complete the project.
meanings.sent2: The club is multimember, allowing many people to join.
meanings.sent3: The multimember picnic had so much food, everyone left with a full stomach.
meanings.sent4: The multimember choir harmonized beautifully during the concert.
meanings.sent5: The multimember family reunion was a joyous occasion with relatives from near and far.

meanings.definition: A group or organization with multiple members.
meanings.sent1: The multimember committee made decisions collectively.
meanings.sent2: The multimember band played music for the event.
meanings.sent3: The multimember book club met every month to discuss their latest read.
meanings.sent4: The multimember sports team celebrated their victory with high-fives.
meanings.sent5: The multimember volunteer group helped clean up the park together.
